pwa.title: Apps
pwa.description: Vorlesungsplan+ is a PWA (Progressive Web App), which means a web application that can be installed on your device like a native app. You can find instructions on how to install it for the most common browsers below.

iosWidget.title: iOS Widget
iosWidget.description: Follow the instructions below to install the Vorlesungsplan+ iOS widget on your iPhone or iPad.

steps.downloadWidget: Click on the button above to download the widget
steps.openWithScriptable: Open the downloaded file, click the share icon and open it with Scriptable. Then click on "Add to My Scripts"
steps.addToHomescreen: Add a new widget to your home screen as usual. Select the Scriptable app as widget/app
steps.editWidget: Press and hold the widget and click on "Edit widget". Here, select the Vorlesungsplan+ widget as script and enter your desired course as parameter. Your currently selected courses are: {courses}
